dcterms:creator: Eugene Vorontsov
et al
dcterms:description: The LiTS training dataset consists of 130 3D volumetric CT scans collected from different clinical sites, which are contrast-enhanced for better viewing. The dataset includes scans with varying spatial resolutions and field of view, resized to have a side-length of 256 pixels.
dcterms:title: 2017 Liver Tumor Segmentation (LiTS) Challenge

dcterms:creator: Patrick Ferdinand Christ
et al
dcterms:description: The 3DIRCAD dataset is used for automatic liver and lesion segmentation in CT scans, employing cascaded fully convolutional neural networks and 3D conditional random fields.
dcterms:title: 3DIRCAD dataset
